post.author: 김병호
post.content:
Dear Mr. park, first of all, I would like to thank you for the inside info. It looks like a permanent full time position. Would the company consider a contactor ? I have qualifications they are looking for.

Andy Kim  
>방금 공고한것입니다.
>최소 18개월가량 진행되는 프로젝트에 투입될 예정입니다.
>현재 사람을 뽑는 중입니다.
>잘 읽어 보기고 지원하시기 바랍니다.
>MS 관련 기술이 필요하고, XML,WML관련 경험이 있으면 Asset입니다.
>웹 사이트 : www.famousplayers.ca/Static/fp_corporate.asp
>Good luck !
>
>==========================
>Responsibilities / Duties:
>
>Work closely with I.T. Development and Technical team to provide overall project management for systems related projects as assigned by I.T. Directors and Vice President.
>Perform business analysis and document workflows and processes for the development of project requirements and functional/technical specifications.
>Participate in the planning, design and development of new systems.
>Provide project management for I.T. projects including MS Project plans, timelines, resource management, budget monitoring, status reports, update meetings and presentations.
>Perform and/or coordinate Quality Assurance testing for new systems.
>Work with I.T. team and users to conduct User Acceptance testing including creation of business cases, test scripts, and manage change req 이?.
>Coordinate the implementation of new systems and enhancements including rollout schedules and resource management.
>Participate in projects and perform various duties as assigned by Directors and Vice President.
>
>
>Skills and Requirements
>
>Education:
>University education or equivalent experience required.
>Computer Science related degree or certification desired.
>
>Experience:
>2-3 years of I.T. related Project Management.
>Good working knowledge of the Application Development Life Cycle, Client/Server SQL Platforms, Networking within an NT OS environment, LANS, WANs, TCP/IP.
>Resource management and budgeting experience a must
>
>Skills:
>Must be proactive and possess strong interpersonal, customer service, communication, presentation and organizational skills.
>Must be self motivated and able to motivate
>Excellent Project Management skills and facilitation skills.
>Must be proficient with MS Project and MS Office Pro in a Windows environment.
>Must be able to handle mutiple priorities and manage available resources accordingly.
>Some on-call availability required.
>Some off-hours work required.
>Some travel may be required.
>
>Interested candidates are encouraged to send their resume, cover letter and salary expectations to:
>
>Famous Players Inc.
>Human Resources
>146 Bloor St. W.
>Toronto, Ontario
>M5S 1P3  Email: jobs@famousplayers.ca
>
>Fax: (416) 964-6450  
>
>
post.title: [re] 구인 : Famous Players ( Manager급)
